import{defaultDirection}from"../constants/defaultValues";export const mapOrder=(array,order,key)=>{array.sort(function(a,b){var A=a[key],B=b[key];if(order.indexOf(A+"")>order.indexOf(B+"")){return 1;}else{return-1;}});return array;};export const getDateWithFormat=()=>{const today=new Date();let dd=today.getDate();let mm=today.getMonth()+1;//January is 0!
var yyyy=today.getFullYear();if(dd<10){dd='0'+dd;}if(mm<10){mm='0'+mm;}return dd+'.'+mm+'.'+yyyy;};export const getCurrentTime=()=>{const now=new Date();return now.getHours()+":"+now.getMinutes();};export const getDirection=()=>{let direction=defaultDirection;if(localStorage.getItem("direction")){const localValue=localStorage.getItem("direction");if(localValue==="rtl"||localValue==="ltr"){direction=localValue;}}return{direction,isRtl:direction==="rtl"};};export const setDirection=localValue=>{let direction="ltr";if(localValue==="rtl"||localValue==="ltr"){direction=localValue;}localStorage.setItem("direction",direction);};
